long_description: The Super B Essential tool kit has 10 essential tools for the home mechanic. They come packed inside a durable plastic tool box. Tools include cassette remover with pin tool (Shimano type). 15mm pedal wrench. Allen wrenches (1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6 and 8mm). Crank remover. Chain rivet extractor (UB/HG compatible). Cog removal chain. Cable puller. Torx tool (size 25). Spoke wrenches (black and red). Cable cutter. Tool box dimensions: 13 x 5 x 5 in.
short_description: The Super B Essential tool kit has 10 essential tools for the home mechanic. They come packed inside a durable plastic tool box.
